TopicTitle: that moment when you f5 instead of f9...

Articles.Content:
i have to share my rage. i failed

i was supposed to escape mun trajectory to test the spark, just ran out of fuel because i tried to land with no legs (which went horribly wrong)

i tried to f9, but i pressed f5 instead...

ok i have shared my stupidness now.

time to do amother mission for the spark...

Use Alt-F5 and Alt-F9 instead.

Then this sort of thing can't happen, confirmation boxes can be a pain but it's better than losing progress or saving a mistake.

We've all been there though!

I don't use F5 at all, except when leaving game.

Edit: I mean to say, every second or third mission turns like this for me. I started with career by blowing up Bob
